div.p: This provides a list of changes to the Digital Documentation of COVID-19 Certificates (DDCC) Implementation Guide (IG) since its initial release.
2022-01-25 v0.3.1 - Update Changes to DDCC IG based on FHIR R4.

ul.li: Merge of draft DDCC: Test Result branch with DDCC: Vaccination Status content.

div.p: 2021-08-27 v0.3.0 - Update Changes to DDCC IG based on FHIR R4.

ul.li: Public release of DDCC: Vaccination Status guidance.

div.p: 2021-06-03 v0.2.1 - Update Changes to DDCC IG based on FHIR R4.

ul.li: Updated based on feedback from public comment release and changed name to DDCC.

div.p: 2021-03-04 v0.0.1 - Initial Smart Vaccination Certificate IG based on FHIR R4.
